description: Our paper,"PAR: Political Actor Representation Learning with Social Context and Expert Knowledge", has been accepted at EMNLP 2022.

Congratulations to team members Qingyue Zhang, Yanbo Wang for their incoming PhD journey!</br>
Qingyue Zhang is joining Prof. Shao-Lun Huang's lab @ Tsinghua SIGS.</br>
Yanbo Wang is joining Prof. Muhan Zhang's lab @ PKU.
Our paper, "TwiBot-22: Towards Graph-Based Twitter Bot Detection", has been accepted at NeurIPS, Dataset and Benchmark Track, 2022.
Our paper, "AHEAD: A Triple Attention Based Heterogeneous Graph Anomaly Detection Approach" goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at
Our paper, "BIC: Twitter Bot Detection with Text-Graph Interaction and Semantic Consistency" goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at
Our paper, "KRACL: Contrastive Learning with Graph Context Modeling for Sparse Knowledge Graph Completion" goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at
Our paper, "GraTO: Graph Neural Network Framework Tackling Over-smoothing with Neural Architecture Search", has been accepted at CIKM 2022.
Our paper, "TwiBot-22: Towards Graph-Based Twitter Bot Detection" goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at
Our paper, "KCD: Knowledge Walks and Textual Cues Enhanced Political Perspective Detection in News Media", has been accepted at NAACL 2022. Check out our work at
Congratulations to director Shangbin Feng for his incoming Ph.D. journey under the supervision of Prof. Yulia Tsvetkov at the University of Washington!
Congratulations to team member Binchi Zhang for his incoming Ph.D. journey under the supervision of Prof. Jundong Li at the University of Virginia!
"Knowledge Graph Augmented Political Perspective Detection in News Media" is significantly updated and available at

"Legislator Representation Learning with Social Context and Expert Knowledge", formerly "Encoding Heterogeneous Social and Political Context for Entity Stance Prediction", is significantly updated and availble at
Our paper, "Heterogeneity-aware Twitter Bot Detection with Relational Graph Transformers", has been accepted at AAAI 2022.
Our paper, "PPSGCN: A Privacy-Preserving Subgraph Sampling Based Distributed GCN Training Method", goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at

Congratulations to team members Herun Wan, Ningnan Wang, Zilong Chen, Qingyao Li, Peisheng Yu for their incoming PhD candidacy!</br>
Herun Wan is joining Prof. Minnan Luo's lab @ XJTU.</br>
Ningnan Wang is joining Prof. Hongbin Sun's lab @ XJTU.</br>
Zilong Chen is joining Prof. Huaping Liu's lab @ THU.</br>
Qingyao Li is joining Prof. Yong Yu's lab @ SJTU.</br>
Peisheng Yu is joining Prof. Man-cho-so's lab @ CUHK.
Our paper, "BotRGCN: Twitter Bot Detection with Relational Graph Convolutional Networks", has been accepted at ASONAM 2021.
Our paper, "Heterogeneity-aware Twitter Bot Detection with Relational Graph Transformers", goes live on Arxiv. Check out our work at
Our paper, "SATAR: A Self-supervised Approach to Twitter Account Representation Learning and its Application in Bot Detection", has been accepted at CIKM 2021.
Our paper, "TwiBot-20: A Comprehensive Twitter Bot Detection Benchmark", has been accepted at CIKM 2021.
